Servalcat commands
==================

SPA
---

refine_spa_norefmac
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Refinement pipeline for SPA. The weighted and sharpened Fo-Fc map is calculated after the refinement. For details please see the reference.

   :language: console
